title: Dance Of Ouled Nail (1902) Directed By Segundo De Chomón

sources.title: Dance Of Ouled Nail (1902) Directed By Segundo De Chomón
sources.description: Dance of Ouled Nail (1902) 'Danse des Ouléd-Naïd' Director: Segundo de Chomón A short film featuring several dancers from different countries: first an Arabian dancer, then an Algerian belly dancer, and finally Scottish highlanders in kilts performing a jig. Section one is rendered in hand-color.
